modName: Destruction Perks Apply to Weapon Enchants
summary: Destruction Perks Intense Flames, Deep Freeze, and Disintegrate will now work with enchanted weapons. This applies to leveled loot, artifact, and enchanting table weapons with fire, frost, and shock enchantments. Must have perk and enemy\'s health must be low.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s kind of silly that these perks don\'t apply to weapon enchants in vanilla Skyrim, as if Skyrim magic could be any worse.

Destruction Perks Intense Flames, Deep Freeze, and Disintegrate will now work with enchanted weapons. This applies to leveled loot, artifact, and enchanting table weapons with fire, frost, and shock enchantments. Must have perk and enemy\'s health must be low.

If I missed anything, please let me know.

This mod may not be uploaded to any other site
This mod may not be used without permission

Thanks and enjoy
author: tg08096
